Scripting.Code: function m dim gApp m = "Adobe Acrobat Reader is installed correctly on the server" on error resume next Set gApp = CreateObject("AcroExch.App") If Err.Number <> 0 Then If Err.Number = 429 Then m = "Adobe Acrobat Reader is not installed on the server." else m = "There was an error testing for Adobe Acrobat Reader. Please check that it is installed correctly on the server." End If end if end function

Field.Name: Name
Field.Caption: Name
Field.HelpDefault: The page title found when this link was fetched. If the page had no title or if there was a problem loading the page, the link is used.

Field.Name: Link
Field.Caption: Link
Field.HelpDefault: The URL for this document. The URL most likely was found on another document.

Field.Name: Host
Field.Caption: Host
Field.HelpDefault: The domain name part of the link. Calculated when the document is fetched.

Field.Name: Path
Field.Caption: Path
Field.HelpDefault: The path part of the link. Calculated when the document is fetched.

Field.Name: Page
Field.Caption: Page
Field.HelpDefault: The page part of the link. Calculated when the document is fetched.

Field.Name: PageID
Field.Caption: Content Page
Field.HelpDefault: If this document was found on this website, this is the page content record associated with this document.

Field.Name: SectionID
Field.Caption: Site Section
Field.HelpDefault: If this document was found on this website, this is the site section record associated with this document.

Field.Name: UpToDate
Field.Caption: UpToDate
Field.HelpDefault: When checked, this document has been successfully fetched. When an edit is detected for the page listed as the content page, this field is cleared.

Field.Name: QueryString
Field.Caption: QueryString
Field.HelpDefault: The querystring part of the Link.

Field.Name: SocketResponse
Field.Caption: SocketResponse
Field.HelpDefault: When the document is fetched, this is the http socket response.

Field.Name: LastRefreshDate
Field.Caption: LastRefreshDate
Field.HelpDefault: The time and date when this document was last fetched.

Field.Name: HTTPResponse
Field.Caption: HTTPResponse
Field.HelpDefault: The http status line when this document as last fetched.

Field.Name: ResponseTime
Field.Caption: ResponseTime
Field.HelpDefault: The time it took to retrieve this document

Field.Name: ContentType
Field.Caption: Content Type
Field.HelpDefault: The content type of the document.

Field.Name: Length
Field.Caption: Length
Field.HelpDefault: The length of the document

Field.Name: UnknownWordList
Field.Caption: UnknownWordList
Field.HelpDefault: When the document is fetched, it is spell checked. This is the list of unknown words found.

Field.Name: TextOnlyFilename
Field.Caption: TextOnlyFilename
Field.HelpDefault: This is the text retrieved form the document. This field can be as long as necessary, but can not be text searched.

Field.Name: BodyText
Field.Caption: Body Text
Field.HelpDefault: This is the text retrieved from the document. It has a limited size, but is text searched.

Field.Name: PrimaryImageLink
Field.Caption: Primary Image Link
Field.HelpDefault: When this document was fetched, this is the first image found within the content of the page. It can be used in text search results.

Field.Name: PrimaryImageWidth
Field.Caption: Primary Image Width
Field.HelpDefault: The size of the primary image.

Field.Name: PrimaryImageHeight
Field.Caption: Primary Image Height
Field.HelpDefault: The size of the primary image.

Field.Name: dateLastModified
Field.Caption: LastModified
Field.HelpDefault: When the document was fetched, it may include information about when the content was last edited. If it does, this is that date.

Field.Name: MetaDescription
Field.Caption: MetaDescription
Field.HelpDefault: The meta description from the document when it was fetched. This can be used in the text search.

Field.Name: MetaKeywords
Field.Caption: MetaKeywords
Field.HelpDefault: The meta keywords from the document when it was fetched. This can be used in the text search.

Field.Name: duplicateContent
Field.Caption: Duplicate Content
Field.HelpDefault: When checked, the spider determined that this document is a duplicate of another document already in the Spider Docs table. This should be used to block the document from displaying in the full text search.

Field.Name: managingApplication
Field.Caption: Managing Application
Field.HelpDefault: If blank, this document is controlled by the spider so it may be deleted if there are no other documents linked to this page. If not blank, the spider will fetch the document but will not delete the document if not links are found. The document must be managed by the application that adds it.The document is parsed using the same rules as any other.
